name: .Nyctophobia
description:
_Welcome to the Machine;

.Nyctophobia is a top down survival minigame, in which you play against a rather... friendly... entity living inside your computer. Remember: USE THE LIGHT!

//This game was created as part of a personal dare: basically I dared myself to make a game in under 3 days... and I made it! Yay! It was a helluva ride, I admit, but the learning process was amazing!

/*The game might have a few bugs. If you encounter one, please let me know at pablo@warkiwistudios.com*/

H A V E   F U N.
